20101219014419.333|20101219014421.000|CCO|  games with my grandchildren.
20101219014421.000|20101219014422.429|CCO|           Great news!
20101219014422.429|20101219014423.857|CCO|      For people with COPD,
20101219014423.857|20101219014425.286|CCO|  including chronic bronchitis,
20101219014425.286|20101219014426.714|CCO|       emphysema, or both,
20101219014426.714|20101219014428.143|CCO|   ADVAIR helps significantly
20101219014428.143|20101219014429.571|CCO|     improve lung function.
20101219014429.571|20101219014431.000|CCO| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101219014431.000|20101219014432.000|CCO|  ADVAIR is different from most
20101219014432.000|20101219014433.000|CCO|     other COPD medications
20101219014433.000|20101219014434.000|CCO|       because it contains
20101219014434.000|20101219014435.000|CCO|    both an anti-inflammatory
20101219014435.000|20101219014436.000|CCO|        and a long-acting
20101219014436.000|20101219014437.000|CCO|         bronchodilator,
20101219014437.000|20101219014438.000|CCO|        working together
20101219014438.000|20101219014439.000|CCO|   to help you breathe better.
20101219014439.000|20101219014440.000|CCO|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101219014440.000|20101219014441.000|CCO|  inhalers for sudden symptoms
20101219014441.000|20101219014442.429|CCO|        and should not be
20101219014442.429|20101219014443.857|CCO|   used more than twice a day.
20101219014443.857|20101219014445.286|CCO| People with COPD taking ADVAIR
20101219014445.286|20101219014446.714|CCO|    may have a higher chance
20101219014446.714|20101219014448.143|CCO|          of pneumonia.
20101219014448.143|20101219014449.571|CCO|       ADVAIR may increase
20101219014449.571|20101219014451.000|CCO|    your risk of osteoporosis
20101219014451.000|20101219014452.429|CCO|     and some eye problems.
20101219014452.429|20101219014453.857|CCO|        Tell your doctor
20101219014453.857|20101219014455.286|CCO|  if you have a heart condition
20101219014455.286|20101219014456.714|CCO|     or high blood pressure
20101219014456.714|20101219014458.143|CCO|      before taking ADVAIR.
20101219014458.143|20101219014459.571|CCO|    I had fun today, Grandpa.
20101219014459.571|20101219014501.000|CCO|                You and me both.
20101219014501.000|20101219014502.111|CCO|   If COPD is still making it
20101219014502.111|20101219014503.222|CCO|        hard to breathe,
20101219014503.222|20101219014504.333|CCO|         ask your doctor
20101219014504.333|20101219014505.444|CCO|       if including ADVAIR
